thread.title: Healing Falcons clear out injury list for game at Titans
thread.title_full: Healing Falcons clear out injury list for game at Titans

title: Healing Falcons clear out injury list for game at Titans
text: FLOWERY BRANCH, Ga. -- Wide receivers Roddy White, Leonard Hankerson and Eric Weems have been upgraded to probable, moving the Atlanta Falcons closer to full health for their game at Tennessee on Sunday. Linebacker Justin Durant, who missed last week's loss at New Orleans with an elbow injury, also was upgraded to probable on Friday after being limited on Thursday. Center Mike Person (ankle), who also missed last week's game, also is expected to start on Sunday. Wide receiver Julio Jones, who has been a regular on the injury list this season, has been fully cleared all week for the first time since Week 1. ___ AP NFL website: www.pro32.ap.org and AP NFL Twitter feed: www.twitter.com/AP_NFL Share this page
